settings.heading: This is What High Standards Look Like

settings.text: The Alpecin products are manufactured under high standards in Germany. The safety of a substance is assessed by the Scientific Committee on Consumer Safety (SCCS) of the European Commission. Only if a substance has been rated safe for end consumers in EVERY respect by the SCCS it can be approved for inclusion in the current Cosmetics Regulation.

settings.heading: Fight for your hair!

settings.text:
Men of all ages ask, “Can I keep my hair and if so, how?” The topic of “impending hair fall” is in many people’s heads.

But most men accept hair fall as an unchangeable fate as soon as the first signs of thinner hair show up.

They don’t know that daily hair care can make a difference if they want to keep their hair.

settings.heading: Caffeine is known as an energiser.

settings.text:
As one of the most heavily researched cosmetic ingredient in the world, caffeine is a known energiser that helps maintain the appearance of healthy hair.

The Dr. Wolff research team has succeeded in getting the optimum concentration of caffeine, in the form of shampoos or liquids, directly to the hair. The Alpecin caffeine complex products contain caffeine, zinc and niaci

settings.heading: Get fuller-looking hair.

settings.text:
Our special formulation leaves out silicones or softeners that weigh the hair down, making it look weak and lifeless.

Because of this deliberate omission, Alpecin caffeine shampoo gives your hair more grip and volume with every hair wash.

It contains a unique combination of caffeine, zinc and niacin to help strengthens your hair.

Alpecin is the ideal hair care product for men experiencing reduced hair volume.

settings.heading: Is caffeine shampoo good for your hair?
settings.row_content: Yes, caffeine shampoo is good for the hair. Alpecin, in particular, was formulated to help men improve the appearance of hair by making it look thicker and healthier with daily wash. Our caffeine complex energises the hair by adding lustre and body.

settings.heading: Do caffeine shampoos work?
settings.row_content: Caffeine shampoos work by improving the appearance of hair, making it look fuller and healthier with daily normal wash. We recommend using our caffeine hair shampoo everyday for the best results. As a rule, you can expect to see noticeable results after about three months.

settings.heading: Which is the best caffeine shampoo?
settings.row_content: Alpecin is Germany’s top-selling caffeine shampoo for men. It is in high demand around the world thanks to its unique formulation, active ingredients, attractive packaging, and ease of use. But there is only one way to know for sure, and that is to try Alpecin yourself and see the results.

settings.heading: Is Alpecin good for your hair?
settings.row_content: Yes, Alpecin is good for dull, limp, and thinning hair. Alpecin C1 contains caffeine along with zinc and niacin to help make hair look healthier and stronger with daily hair wash.

settings.heading: Which Alpecin shampoo is best?
settings.row_content: The best Alpecin product depends on your unique hair and scalp needs. Alpecin Caffeine Shampoo C1 creates the appearance of fuller and stronger hair with daily wash. Alpecin Double Effect Caffeine Shampoo does the same job while gently removing loose dandruff the scalp. Alpecin Liquid is ideal for men who don’t wash their hair everyday but wish to experience the benefits of caffeine.

settings.heading: Is caffeine shampoo good for dandruff?
settings.row_content: Yes, caffeine shampoo is good for dandruff. Alpecin Double Effect Caffeine Shampoo, in particular, removes loose dandruff from the hair in addition to revitalising the appearance of dull and lifeless hair. This special formulation includes salicylic acid and piroctone olamine in addition to caffeine complex.

settings.heading: Should you use Alpecin everyday?
settings.row_content:
Yes, we recommend using Alpecin everyday for the best results. If you do not want to wash your hair daily, we suggest using Alpecin
Caffeine Liquid instead. Simply massage the tonic into the scalp and wait 2 to 3 minutes before using styling products like hair gel or wax. No need to rinse. It’s a convenient alternative to Alpecin shampoo.

settings.heading: Does Alpecin darken the hair?
settings.row_content:
Yes, we recommend using Alpecin everyday for the best results. If you do not want to wash your hair daily, we suggest using Alpecin
Caffeine Liquid instead. Simply massage the tonic into the scalp and wait 2 to 3 minutes before using styling products like hair gel or wax. No need to rinse. It’s a convenient alternative to Alpecin shampoo.

settings.heading: How do you use Alpecin Double Effect shampoo?
settings.row_content: To use Alpecin Double Effect, simply massage into the hair and scalp. Leave the product on for about 2 minutes before rinsing hair thoroughly. We recommend washing your hair daily with Alpecin Double Effect for the best results.

settings.heading: Does Alpecin have side effects?
settings.row_content: All our Alpecin products are generally well-tolerated and safe for daily use. However, if you are allergic to caffeine or any of the ingredients listed on the label, ourcaffeine shampoomay not be suitable for you.

settings.heading: Does Alpecin caffeine shampoo work?
settings.row_content:
Alpecin shampoo works by making the hair look thicker and healthier with daily normal wash. It is suitable for men who want to improve the appearance of dull, limp, and thin hair.

To get the best results, massage our caffeine shampoo into the hair
and scalp, and leave on for about 2 or 3 minutes before rinsing.

If you do not wash your hair daily, we recommend Alpecin Caffeine Liquid as a leave-in, no-rinse alternative to our caffeine shampoo

settings.heading: Can females use Alpecin shampoo?
settings.row_content:
Alpecin Caffeine Shampoo C1 is especially formulated for men and
this is reflected in the scent and packaging of the product. However, the caffeine-based active ingredient complex is not gender specific and is thus also effective in women.

If you are interested in using caffeine shampoo, we recommend Plantur 39 for women over 40 who wish to have thicker-looking hair.
Like Alpecin, our Plantur 39 product range contains caffeine and a host of supporting ingredients that improve the appearance of fine,
brittle hair.

settings.heading: What does caffeine shampoo do for your hair?
settings.row_content: The caffeine complex in Alpecin energises the hair, adding sheen and volume with daily wash. The lack of conditioning agents in the formula also helps create the appearance of thicker, more voluminous hair as these agents are known to weigh down the hair strands, making hair look flat and limp.
